title: Ikigai - Disrupting Games via NFTs
description: The video game industry market is bigger than the music and film industry combined; however, NFT's have only begun to scratch the surface.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses the objectives laid out in the challenge. Gaming has huge potential to attract new users to Cardano, however a thorough market research hasn't been done. This research will provide important data for future developers to build their model on. Moreover, with this data, there will be less speculation in the NFT space.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer clearly provided information of the team member with evidence of skills and experience. They also provided clear breakdown of manpower and resources allocation. Budget breakdown was clearly presented. In addition, the proposer also clearly explains how the plan will be executed. With all the information provided, this proposal has high chance to be implemented
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap presented are realistic and achievable. This proposal also presented the KPI for definition of success. However, the proposer did not mention on how will the community keep track of the progress. I suggest making the roundtable sessions with your advisors public so the community can receive updates on the research. Is there any other way for reporting progress to the community?

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is for funding for research to produce NFT business models, this proosal will not have a direct effect on the Cardano ecosystem but if succesfull the proposal can indirectly attract users to the Cardano ecosystem and thus indirectly increase Cardano utility.   I feel the proposal did not fully adress the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: I like the idea but the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would want to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team work history, education and past experiences. The team can expand on the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". I would like the team to expand on the plan to go to market and acquire customers.
f6_assessments.q2: I would like to see the budget broken down into monthly spending and I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the labor must provide and when must they deliver the tasks – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the labor spending I thus providing a mechanism tracking performance and spending over time.. As the project stand at the moment, I feel the project will be difficult to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the need to look beyond NFT use and commercialization in games, however how does this work become long term and sustainable for the researchers and the community versus a one off assessment. Can this process be digitized into a tool that is manned by researchers to ease their process and also to have the process automated as there will be such a similar need when the economic environments change in the web3 space and also for various communities and civilisations.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has a well vast experience of people who can accomplish this task, the plan and deliverables are clearly defined and in very good detail.
f6_assessments.q2: There is not enough information provided for the community to be able to follow this project.

solution: Create a bundle of comprehensive, extensive business models that address both how NFTs improve or disrupt existing business models
